thread.title: Republican candidate Kasich to call for no-fly zones in Syria
thread.title_full: Republican candidate Kasich to call for no-fly zones in Syria - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Republican candidate Kasich to call for no-fly zones in Syria
text: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. Republican presidential candidate John Kasich on Friday morning will advocate for certain areas of Syria to be designated as sanctuaries from violence for civilians and made no-fly zones given Russian President Vladimir Putin's recent decision to target Islamic State there with air strikes.
